title: Add additional generated photos to every routed page

requirements.summary: Add at least one additional generated image to every routed page using existing PageHeroImage styling and cache-busting behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Each route in frontend/src/App.tsx (/, /about, /services, /contact, /appointments, /emergency, /doctor-suites, /domain-draft, /decommissioned, and the * not-found route) renders at least one additional / compared to the current implementation.
All newly-added images load from /assets/generated/... and use the existing cache-busting approach (directly via PageHeroImage or via withCacheBust for non-PageHero images).
All new images include meaningful English alt text.
Pages remain responsive on mobile and desktop; images do not overflow their containers and maintain rounded/shadow styling consistent with existing hero imagery.

file_operations.description: Add an additional photo section (e.g., a small supporting image block) using PageHeroImage and the generated asset frontend/public/assets/generated/home-facilities-collage.dim_1600x900.png; ensure meaningful English alt text and responsive rounded/shadow styling.

Add an additional supporting image section using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/about-facilities-corridor.dim_1600x900.png; keep layout responsive and consistent with existing hero imagery styling.

Add an additional supporting image section using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/services-equipment-collage.dim_1600x900.png; include meaningful English alt text and maintain existing rounded/shadow styling.

Add an additional supporting image section using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/contact-reception.dim_1600x900.png (e.g., near the contact info or above the form); ensure responsive sizing and meaningful English alt text.

Add an additional supporting image section using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/appointments-consult-room.dim_1600x900.png; ensure cache-busting via PageHeroImage and use meaningful English alt text.

Add an additional supporting image section using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/emergency-ambulance.dim_1600x900.png; ensure responsive layout and consistent rounded/shadow styling.

Add an additional supporting image section using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/doctors-portraits-collage.dim_1600x900.png; keep spacing consistent with existing sections and include meaningful English alt text.

Ensure the authenticated Domain Draft view includes at least one additional supporting image beyond the existing hero (use PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/domain-admin-desk.dim_1600x900.png or another generated asset) while maintaining existing behavior.

Add a second illustration/photo block (in addition to the current PageHeroImage) using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/decommissioned-tools-illustration.dim_1200x600.png; keep centered layout responsive and consistent.

Add a second illustration/photo block (in addition to the current PageHeroImage) using PageHeroImage with frontend/public/assets/generated/notfound-navigation-illustration.dim_1200x600.png; ensure meaningful English alt text and responsive sizing.

requirements.summary: Add a generated image to the Domain Draft unauthenticated view so it matches other pages’ photo presence.
acceptanceCriteria: When not authenticated, /domain-draft includes an image component (e.g., PageHeroImage) using a generated asset and English alt text.
When authenticated, the existing hero image remains and the page also satisfies the “additional photo content” requirement.

file_operations.description: Update the unauthenticated (not logged in) rendering branch to include a PageHeroImage (or equivalent) using frontend/public/assets/generated/domain-admin-desk.dim_1600x900.png with meaningful English alt text; keep the existing alert/text content and ensure the view remains responsive.

requirements.summary: Add newly generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference each in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: All image filenames listed in imageRequirements.required exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Each listed new image is referenced by at least one page component.
No backend endpoints are added/changed to serve images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset file 'Hospital facilities photo collage' at frontend/public/assets/generated/home-facilities-collage.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Doctors with patient in consultation room' at frontend/public/assets/generated/appointments-consult-room.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Reception/front-desk staff helping a visitor' at frontend/public/assets/generated/contact-reception.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Ambulance arriving at emergency entrance' at frontend/public/assets/generated/emergency-ambulance.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Medical services equipment close-up collage' at frontend/public/assets/generated/services-equipment-collage.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Group portrait of doctors in corridor' at frontend/public/assets/generated/doctors-portraits-collage.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Administrative office desk with laptop and documents' at frontend/public/assets/generated/domain-admin-desk.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Maintenance tools and caution signage illustration' at frontend/public/assets/generated/decommissioned-tools-illustration.dim_1200x600.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Map/compass style illustration for navigation help' at frontend/public/assets/generated/notfound-navigation-illustration.dim_1200x600.png.
Add the generated static asset file 'Hospital ward corridor wide shot' at frontend/public/assets/generated/about-facilities-corridor.dim_1600x900.png.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/home-facilities-collage.dim_1600x900.png in the UI (via PageHeroImage or withCacheBust for a plain ) to ensure it is actually used.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/appointments-consult-room.dim_1600x900.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/contact-reception.dim_1600x900.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/emergency-ambulance.dim_1600x900.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/services-equipment-collage.dim_1600x900.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/doctors-portraits-collage.dim_1600x900.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.

Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/domain-admin-desk.dim_1600x900.png in both unauthenticated and authenticated views as applicable so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/decommissioned-tools-illustration.dim_1200x600.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/notfound-navigation-illustration.dim_1200x600.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/about-facilities-corridor.dim_1600x900.png in the UI so the new asset is used and cache-busted via PageHeroImage.
